title: Redesign visual theme and layout

requirements.text: Redesign the overall visual theme of the application with a fresh, cohesive aesthetic — including a new color palette, typography choices, and layout structure — that feels distinct from the current dark mode implementation. Apply the new theme consistently across all pages and components.
acceptanceCriteria: A new color palette is defined in index.css and tailwind.config.js, replacing the current OKLCH tokens
The new theme is applied consistently across HomeFeed, ListingDetail, Profile, Search, Chat, and all shared components
The AppHeader, BottomNav, HeroSection, and ListingCard components all reflect the new visual style
Typography (font choices, sizes, weights) is updated to match the new theme
Both light and dark mode variants are updated to reflect the new palette
The overall layout and spacing feels clean and organized on both mobile and desktop viewports

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
Do not change backend data models or Motoko logic
nonGoals: Altering navigation structure or routing logic
